title: Lotus Kindred skin idea
body:
Hi guys, 

I created a fanart concept design for a Lotus skin idea for Kindred. There's something very calming about her when I play her even when I get my face stomped on. I hope you guys can enjoy and provide constructive criticism if any. Thanks!


http://imgur.com/lKzHMt8
http://imgur.com/KLp0hDh

replies.body: This is awesome. Kick ass job ^_^
I love it. Order of the Lotus is one of my favorite skin lines, so I already love the Lotus theme.
Only problem I see is that I believe (and I quite frankly might be mistaken here) that all Order of the Lotus skins are strictly for Ionian champions respectively.
